text: Phir jab unhon ne apna samaan khola to dekha ke unka maal bhi unhein wapas kardiya gaya hai. Yeh dekh kar woh pukar utthey “abbajaan, aur humein kya chahiye, dekhiye yeh hamara maal bhi humein wapas de diya gaya hai. Bas ab hum jayenge aur apne ehal o ayal ke liye rasad (provisions of food) le ayenge , apne bhai ki hifazat bhi karenge aur ek barishtar (an extra camel load of corn) aur zyada bhi le ayenge. Inte galley ka izafa aasani ke saath ho jayega”
